resources.string: 😎 Congratulations! You’re in a great place now. Keep up your healthy habits to maintain your healthy weight.
🤕 We wish you to show some love to yourself! You need to add healthy calories, go nutrient dense and seek medical advice to gain weight.
🥺 It’s time to take care of yourself and get rid of the risk of poor immune function and osteoporosis. Treat yourself to a balanced meal and a variety of nutrients.
😳 It seems that your body needs more fuel. Unless you’re naturally very slim, you may need to consider ways of gaining weight as your weight may pose certain health risks.
😠 Don’t wait any longer! It’s time to take action to reach your weight target. You are carrying excess fat and should balance your diet and physical activity to achieve a healthy weight.
😧 Uh-oh! You currently weigh more than is ideal and have an increased risk of developing various health problems. It’s time to embrace healthy eating and increase your activity level.
😣 Time to change! You are at high risk of obesity-related diseases. You should increase physical activity and reduce caloric intake slowly but surely. It is also vital to have health screening.
😫 We are worried about you! Your weight is a serious and imminent threat to your health. Go for health advice and a weight loss plan scientifically.
😉 Don’t be picky eating anymore, your body needs more energy to grow. Try to snack on healthy and high energy foods to put on weight.
👍 Thumbs Up! You’ve done a great job and now only need to keep your lifestyle healthy to stay in this range.
😤 Time to be get moving and say no to junk food! Your extra weight increases the chances of developing health problems. A small amount of weight loss can make a difference.
🤒 Feeling hard to keep up with friends? It’s time to repair your body by staying active and eat healthily! Seek your parents‘ and a health professional’s advice to get support.
